smartPhone.NAME: Aiyo's cell phone
smartPhone.FLAVOR: I carry my cell phone with me, both in England and when I come back.
DESCRIPTIONS: Used to record daily cell phone. Can check out #y sheet music .
anonmod:Sheet music

Guitar.NAME: guitars
Guitar.FLAVOR: Love the sound of a guitar that occasionally inspires its owner
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the show, gain 1 tier of variations.

Tomori_relic.NAME: Band-Aids for Lights
Tomori_relic.FLAVOR: Band-Aids with cute little penguins drawn on them.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the battle, get help from the lamp NL Gravity (3).

Soyorin_relic.NAME: Sharishi's Black Tea
Soyorin_relic.FLAVOR: The black tea that Sharishi likes has a familiar flavor.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the battle, get Sharpsea's help NL Gravity (2).

Sakiko_relic.NAME: Shoko's hairband.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the battle, get Shoko's help NL Gravity (1).

Rana_relic.NAME: Ronaldo's Buffy Mug
Rana_relic.FLAVOR: What's with the Buffy mugs that RiNG uses?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the battle, gain Rakuna's help NL Gravity (0).

Rikki_relic.NAME: Tachi's Drumsticks
Rikki_relic.FLAVOR: One of the essentials for drummers, not provided by the venue.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the battle, gain Rishi's help NL Gravity (0).

Mutsumi_relic.NAME: Mutsu's Gherkin
Mutsumi_relic.FLAVOR: Small cucumbers that sell like hotcakes.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the battle, gain Mutsu's help NL Gravity (-1).

Anon_determination.NAME: MyGO!!!!! Team Logo
Anon_determination.FLAVOR: Imprinted with MyGO !!!!! The memories of Chihaya Aiyin's determination.
DESCRIPTIONS: The Key to the True Ending

Crychic.NAME: Crychic's team logo
Crychic.FLAVOR: Memories that don't belong to you.
DESCRIPTIONS: The Key to the Other Ending

Inner.NAME: InnerFavillae's team logo
Inner.FLAVOR: The price you have paid for this is now the moment of reckoning.
DESCRIPTIONS: The badge that never existed, the key to an unknown ending.

GuitarWhiteAnon.NAME: Guitar - Asakusa & Shimmering Dew
GuitarWhiteAnon.FLAVOR: The star-silver one was a limited edition guitar that Aiyin had bought separately in London and had accompanied her through the most glittering part of her life.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you gain Gravity/Shine, you also gain 1 Tier of Shine/Gravity. You have a chance to trigger Reproduction when you are full of tempo (the chance increases with the number of battles, 1% in normal battles, 2% in elite battles, and 4% in boss battles).

StarAnonGuitar.NAME: ? Aiyo's guitar.
StarAnonGuitar.FLAVOR: Your beloved guitar. To keep you from getting lost, she personally customized the anchor points.
DESCRIPTIONS: Ability to perform a time regression to return to before the end of this journey. Right click to use.

StarAnonPocketWatch.NAME: Silver-colored watch
StarAnonPocketWatch.FLAVOR: It's time to get things back on track!
DESCRIPTIONS: It is now responding to your strongest desires, and you will need its help at the end of this journey.

EliteAshAnonKey.NAME: Empty guitar case.
EliteAshAnonKey.FLAVOR: They will always be there for you, no matter when or where.
DESCRIPTIONS: Turn your next non-elite fight into a special event.

FirstHalfKey.NAME: A key.
FirstHalfKey.FLAVOR: It looks like it should come in pairs of keys, with the other one missing and not working.
DESCRIPTIONS: It's just a key, why would it be in her hand.

SecondHalfKey.NAME: The other key.
SecondHalfKey.FLAVOR: She hid her clues in that song. Go open a new chapter!
DESCRIPTIONS: You can vaguely recall something, a familiar feeling surrounding your heart as well as your fingertips.

Mana_relic.NAME: Mana's Donuts
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the battle, get Mana's help NL Gravity (0).

LastBullet.NAME: arrogance
LastBullet.FLAVOR: The Last Bullet, Save It For Yourself ......
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the beginning of the turn. Whenever you use a card, add #y1 to the count. A count greater than #y600 locks your maximum life to #y1.

FanService.NAME: Fan Welfare
FanService.FLAVOR: --Congratulations, this is a bonus only for longtime fans!
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have played fewer than 26 cards at the end of the battle, upgrade a card in your deck at random.

FrenchFries.NAME: french fried potatoes
DESCRIPTIONS: At the beginning of the turn, if it's a playing turn, give an additional #y1 tier of Shine.

Gig.NAME: The hope of a kinder and kinder
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click to use count +1 and destroy all current enemies.

EnergyBlessing.NAME: Energy Blessing
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] [E] [E] at the start of your turn.

hpBlessing.NAME: Blessing of Strength
DESCRIPTIONS: (Your maximum life is increased to 100x when picked up and fully restored after each battle)

IdeaBlessing.NAME: Potion Blessing
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each battle, fill all empty potion fields with dot potions.

AiHeartBlessing.NAME: Blessings of Ability
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain a card, upgrade it. At the beginning of the turn, gain three tiers of artifacts.

Mashiro.NAME: Makabai Kurata's Fungus
DESCRIPTIONS: Get [E] at the start of the turn and you're a little dizzy and may be having strange hallucinations .

StarAnonBike.NAME: AnonBicycle
StarAnonBike.FLAVOR: No less beloved than the guitar.
DESCRIPTIONS: Limited to once per chapter, you can make one jump in time and space to access the previous floor up to five floors ahead of the current chapter.

PositionZero.NAME: PositionZero
PositionZero.FLAVOR: No matter how many times, I will reach ......
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of the round. At the start of the battle, gain 3x points of Strength , Agility and Shine , and return to the front of the stage at death for +1 count.

yakusokuNoBasho.NAME: Revue Invitation
yakusokuNoBasho.FLAVOR: That tiny hope for that tiny miracle to be realized.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click to use it and travel to the promised stage.

Receipts.NAME: RiNG notes
Receipts.FLAVOR: A small ticket, payable to RiNG. not very cheap dishes giving you a sense of déjà vu.
DESCRIPTIONS: She was there for you when you needed her.
